channel.title: I can connect but no1 else can
channel.description:
yes as title says i can connect to my own server but no1 can: im using hamachi and i can only connect from my pc with either ip:127.0.0.1 or the one hamachi gave me, but when i try from another pc it says "error connecting to server" im using a router and i heard about port forwarding and stuff, but i dont know how to do it my router is a 2 wire 1701 hg any kind of help u can give me will be fully apreciated...
thanks in advance :sirdope
ps: i did read all the help files and tuts but i didnt find a usefull 1 for this situation

item.title: I can connect but no1 else can

item.description:
@_ara72421 wrote:

will someone try to come to me my ip is 68.238.109.233

Read full topic

item.title: I can connect but no1 else can
item.dc:creator: @fishfishfishman fishfishfishman
item.description:
@fishfishfishman wrote:

open port 43594 and tell people to use your ip adress, and you use 127.0.0.1

item.description:
@sirdope wrote:

cawagula:

No, go to that site, that will tell you your ip. Use the IP from that site, not the site itself as your server.

i tried with the ip the site gave me, c mon man im not that stupid,

item.title: I can connect but no1 else can
item.dc:creator: @cawagula cawagula
item.description:
@cawagula wrote:

127.0.0.1 is the wrong IP. Use hamatchi ip, and if that dosn’t work go to www.cmyip.com or www.whatismyip.com and use that IP. Hamatchi is only needed if you can’t forward your ports/ have a router.

Read full topic
item.source: I can connect but no1 else can

Read full topic
